data.title: Annie Girardot, Ugo Tognazi and director Marco Ferreri at a preview cocktail party for the film La Femme Singe (Monkey Woman), on Sept. 27, 1963. Ferreri is presenting a costume. In the film Girardot
meta_keywords: communication arms crossed standing animal representation watching holding obit obituary
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: Annie Girardot, Ugo Tognazi and director Marco Ferreri at a preview cocktail party for the film La Femme Singe (Monkey Woman), on Sept. 27, 1963. Ferreri is presenting a costume. In the film Girardot will play a monkey and Tognazzi will play a gorilla. (AP Photo) - 2NC4FPH from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
